resources.string: Gamer Beware…\nYou\'re in for the \t\t\tGaming Scare…
You are in a dungeon, the rich smell of mildew emanates from the Dungeon walls, what will you do? \n\n\t[Please Press The Buttons to Proceed]

The torch creeks as it is removed from the wall, and a scooby-doo contraption swings you in a circle to the other side of the wall. Before you is stands a man the same height as you, you also have the same birthday. You speak to him and he yawns his truth to you as this:

Hello there traveler… Congratulations on making it this far. I can train your in one of four skills.. but choose wisely for I can only teach you one skill, and then I will bid you farewell and take a nap.
You are in a dark cave…
Eat Old Man [Cannibalism Skill: LOCKED - \nDie Instantly]
Before you stands a large green plant beast. The combat begins!
Congratulations! You beat the boss, as your reward you have earned the crown. Press the winning cup to marvel in your greatness…
